name: Yule Sock
description:
What is Yule Sock?

"On his way to bring presents to all the children, Santa dropped some of the fruits and sweets which were supposed to land in the yule socks.

Don’t miss your chance! But beware of the rods…"

Yule Sock is a retro, 8-bit, Christmas-themed arcade game. You control – guess what? – a yule sock and collect all the Christmassy stuff falling out of Santa's bag.

When collecting fruits and sweets, your score increases, depending on the respective good. Catching rods decreases your score by 10 points.

You play against the time: catch as many stuff as possible during two minutes!

Sweeten your Yuletide with this diverting minigame!

 

Controls

You control the yule sock with the arrow keys (left and right).

 

Features

Local highscore included: match your friends for the extra bit of fun! Up to 12 highscore positions within the game (only offline).

 

Credits

Idea, Gamedesign, Programming
Corvo Bianco Entertainment (@CorvoBiancoDE)

Music, Sounds
Markus Strausfeld (@markustrausfeld)

Made with love in PICO-8 by Lexaloffle Games.

 

Contact and Support

In case of any problems or if you wish to say hello, just contact support@corvo-bianco.de, or use the comments area of this page. We are happy to listen to your feedback. Have fun! :)
